<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glideapp.live_feed" name="Live Feed" version="1.0.0" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.custom_web_service"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_common"/> <import plugin="com.glide.notification"/> </requires>
<description>Interface like Yammer, Facebook, Chatter</description>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="LiveFeedSecurityManager" class="com.glideapp.live_feed.LiveFeedSecurityManager"/> <extension point="com.glideapp.live_feed" name="LiveMessageAdder" class="com.glideapp.live_feed.MessageAdder"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Interface like Yammer, Facebook, Chatter</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glideapp.live_feed</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Live Feed</name> <path>plugin://com.glideapp.live_feed/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.custom_web_service,com.glideapp.live_common,com.glide.notification</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glideapp.live_feed</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
